tool.name: skill
tool.description:
Load a skill to get detailed instructions for a specific task. Skills are markdown files in the prompt/agents/ directory.
Usage: - Call without 'name' to list all available skills - Call with 'name' to load a specific skill's content
Skills provide specialized knowledge and step-by-step guidance for tasks. Use this when a task matches an available skill's description.

parameters.parameter: The skill identifier (e.g., 'code_audit' or 'dynamic/vulnerability_testing'). If not provided, lists all available skills.

returns.field: Skill content or list of available skills
List of skills when listing (name, description, location)
